subject: Football
Lockouts
Organized Labor
Decisions and Verdicts
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: Beginning Friday morning, players will be allowed to go about their off-season business as the N.F.L. awaits a decision on its stay request to preserve the lockout.
snippet: Beginning Friday morning, players will be allowed to go about their off-season business as the N.F.L. awaits a decision on its stay request to preserve the lockout.
